sources.title: Terror in the Haunted House (1958) Step into the house of your nightmaresâ€” if you dare.
sources.description:
Sheila Wayne, has a recurring nightmare about an eerie old house. After marrying Philip, they move to Florida and discover that their new country house is the same one from her dreams. As strange events unfold, they grapple with questions of sanity and the house's dark history.

Original title: My World Dies Screaming (1958) AKA: Terror in the Haunted House

B&W version:  https://youtu.be/1tuZ6n67ef8


Director: Harold Daniels
Writer: Robert C. Dennis
Genres: Colorized, Horror, Mystery, Romance
Main Cast
Gerald Mohr as Philip Tierney
Cathy O'Donnell as Sheila Wayne
William Ching as Mark Snell
John Qualen as Jonah Snell


00:00 Full Movie
00:05 A Haunting Dream - Sheila is plagued by nightmares of a mysterious house.
02:02 A Sinister Invitation - An unseen force draws Sheila to the house in her dreams.
03:36 A Forgotten Past - A psychiatrist delves into Sheila's repressed memories, hinting at a dark secret.
05:08 A Honeymoon Turned Nightmare -Sheila and her husband, Philip, arrive at the dream house, unaware of its sinister history.
11:03 A House of Horrors - Sheila recognizes the house from her dreams and fears for her life.
14:09 A Sinister Caretaker - A strange caretaker, Jonah, guards the house and its secrets.
16:38 A Terrifying Revelation - Sheila discovers a chilling truth about her past and the house.
26:28 A Deadly Game - Phillip's obsession with the house's dark history leads to a dangerous confrontation.
36:26 A Family's Dark Legacy - Sheila learns about the tragic history of the Tierney family and their connection to the house.
47:52 A Desperate Escape - Sheila and Mark, Phillip's cousin, plot to escape the house and break free from the curse.
59:58 A Final Confrontation - Phillip's madness reaches its climax as he attempts to kill Sheila.
1:03:40 A New Beginning -  Sheila overcomes the darkness and emerges from the house, free from the curse.



@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Francis the Talking Mule witnesses a murder. He takes a bumbling reporter named David Prescott under his wing and the two of them set out to solve the crime.
metadata.Writer: Herb Margolis, William Raynor, David Stern
metadata.Actors: Mickey Rooney, Virginia Welles, James Flavin
